00069 static void createVertsTrisData(bContext *C, LinkNode *obs, int *nverts_r, float **verts_r, int *ntris_r, int **tris_r)
00070 {
00071     MVert *mvert;
00072     int nfaces = 0, *tri, i, curnverts, basenverts, curnfaces;
00073     MFace *mface;
00074     float co[3], wco[3];
00075     Object *ob;
00076     LinkNode *oblink, *dmlink;
00077     DerivedMesh *dm;
00078     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00079     LinkNode *dms = NULL;
00080 
00081     int nverts, ntris, *tris;
00082     float *verts;
00083 
00084     nverts = 0;
00085     ntris = 0;
00086 
00087     /* calculate number of verts and tris */
00088     for (oblink = obs; oblink; oblink = oblink->next) {
00089         ob = (Object *) oblink->link;
00090         dm = mesh_create_derived_no_virtual(scene, ob, NULL, CD_MASK_MESH);
00091         BLI_linklist_append(&dms, (void *)dm);
00092 
00093         nverts += dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00094         nfaces = dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
00095         ntris += nfaces;
00096 
00097         /* resolve quad faces */
00098         mface = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
00099         for (i = 0; i < nfaces; i++) {
00100             MFace *mf = &mface[i];
00101             if (mf->v4)
00102                 ntris += 1;
00103         }
00104     }
00105 
00106     /* create data */
00107     verts = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * 3 * nverts, "createVertsTrisData verts");
00108     tris = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int) * 3 * ntris, "createVertsTrisData faces");
00109 
00110     basenverts = 0;
00111     tri = tris;
00112     for (oblink = obs, dmlink = dms; oblink && dmlink;
00113          oblink = oblink->next, dmlink = dmlink->next)
00114     {
00115         ob = (Object *) oblink->link;
00116         dm = (DerivedMesh *) dmlink->link;
00117 
00118         curnverts = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00119         mvert = dm->getVertArray(dm);
00120 
00121         /* copy verts */
00122         for (i = 0; i < curnverts; i++) {
00123             MVert *v = &mvert[i];
00124 
00125             copy_v3_v3(co, v->co);
00126             mul_v3_m4v3(wco, ob->obmat, co);
00127 
00128             verts[3 * (basenverts + i) + 0] = wco[0];
00129             verts[3 * (basenverts + i) + 1] = wco[2];
00130             verts[3 * (basenverts + i) + 2] = wco[1];
00131         }
00132 
00133         /* create tris */
00134         curnfaces = dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
00135         mface = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
00136 
00137         for (i = 0; i < curnfaces; i++) {
00138             MFace *mf = &mface[i];
00139 
00140             tri[0] = basenverts + mf->v1;
00141             tri[1] = basenverts + mf->v3;
00142             tri[2] = basenverts + mf->v2;
00143             tri += 3;
00144 
00145             if (mf->v4) {
00146                 tri[0] = basenverts + mf->v1;
00147                 tri[1] = basenverts + mf->v4;
00148                 tri[2] = basenverts + mf->v3;
00149                 tri += 3;
00150             }
00151         }
00152 
00153         basenverts += curnverts;
00154     }
00155 
00156     /* release derived mesh */
00157     for (dmlink = dms; dmlink; dmlink = dmlink->next) {
00158         dm = (DerivedMesh *) dmlink->link;
00159         dm->release(dm);
00160     }
00161 
00162     BLI_linklist_free(dms, NULL);
00163 
00164     *nverts_r = nverts;
00165     *verts_r = verts;
00166     *ntris_r = ntris;
00167     *tris_r = tris;
00168 }
00169 
00170 static int buildNavMesh(const RecastData *recastParams, int nverts, float *verts, int ntris, int *tris,
00171                         struct recast_polyMesh **pmesh, struct recast_polyMeshDetail **dmesh)
00172 {
00173     float bmin[3], bmax[3];
00174     struct recast_heightfield *solid;
00175     unsigned char *triflags;
00176     struct recast_compactHeightfield *chf;
00177     struct recast_contourSet *cset;
00178     int width, height, walkableHeight, walkableClimb, walkableRadius;
00179     int minRegionArea, mergeRegionArea, maxEdgeLen;
00180     float detailSampleDist, detailSampleMaxError;
00181 
00182     recast_calcBounds(verts, nverts, bmin, bmax);
00183 
00184     /* ** Step 1. Initialize build config ** */
00185     walkableHeight = (int)ceilf(recastParams->agentheight / recastParams->cellheight);
00186     walkableClimb = (int)floorf(recastParams->agentmaxclimb / recastParams->cellheight);
00187     walkableRadius = (int)ceilf(recastParams->agentradius / recastParams->cellsize);
00188     minRegionArea = (int)(recastParams->regionminsize * recastParams->regionminsize);
00189     mergeRegionArea = (int)(recastParams->regionmergesize * recastParams->regionmergesize);
00190     maxEdgeLen = (int)(recastParams->edgemaxlen / recastParams->cellsize);
00191     detailSampleDist = recastParams->detailsampledist < 0.9f ? 0 :
00192                        recastParams->cellsize * recastParams->detailsampledist;
00193     detailSampleMaxError = recastParams->cellheight * recastParams->detailsamplemaxerror;
00194 
00195     /* Set the area where the navigation will be build. */
00196     recast_calcGridSize(bmin, bmax, recastParams->cellsize, &width, &height);
00197 
00198     /* ** Step 2: Rasterize input polygon soup ** */
00199     /* Allocate voxel heightfield where we rasterize our input data to */
00200     solid = recast_newHeightfield();
00201 
00202     if (!recast_createHeightfield(solid, width, height, bmin, bmax, recastParams->cellsize, recastParams->cellheight)) {
00203         recast_destroyHeightfield(solid);
00204 
00205         return 0;
00206     }
00207 
00208     /* Allocate array that can hold triangle flags */
00209     triflags = MEM_callocN(sizeof(unsigned char) * ntris, "buildNavMesh triflags");
00210 
00211     /* Find triangles which are walkable based on their slope and rasterize them */
00212     recast_markWalkableTriangles(RAD2DEG(recastParams->agentmaxslope), verts, nverts, tris, ntris, triflags);
00213     recast_rasterizeTriangles(verts, nverts, tris, triflags, ntris, solid);
00214     MEM_freeN(triflags);
00215 
00216     /* ** Step 3: Filter walkables surfaces ** */
00217     recast_filterLowHangingWalkableObstacles(walkableClimb, solid);
00218     recast_filterLedgeSpans(walkableHeight, walkableClimb, solid);
00219     recast_filterWalkableLowHeightSpans(walkableHeight, solid);
00220 
00221     /* ** Step 4: Partition walkable surface to simple regions ** */
00222 
00223     chf = recast_newCompactHeightfield();
00224     if (!recast_buildCompactHeightfield(walkableHeight, walkableClimb, solid, chf)) {
00225         recast_destroyHeightfield(solid);
00226         recast_destroyCompactHeightfield(chf);
00227 
00228         return 0;
00229     }
00230 
00231     recast_destroyHeightfield(solid);
00232     solid = NULL;
00233 
00234     if (!recast_erodeWalkableArea(walkableRadius, chf)) {
00235         recast_destroyCompactHeightfield(chf);
00236 
00237         return 0;
00238     }
00239 
00240     /* Prepare for region partitioning, by calculating distance field along the walkable surface */
00241     if (!recast_buildDistanceField(chf)) {
00242         recast_destroyCompactHeightfield(chf);
00243 
00244         return 0;
00245     }
00246 
00247     /* Partition the walkable surface into simple regions without holes */
00248     if (!recast_buildRegions(chf, 0, minRegionArea, mergeRegionArea)) {
00249         recast_destroyCompactHeightfield(chf);
00250 
00251         return 0;
00252     }
00253 
00254     /* ** Step 5: Trace and simplify region contours ** */
00255     /* Create contours */
00256     cset = recast_newContourSet();
00257 
00258     if (!recast_buildContours(chf, recastParams->edgemaxerror, maxEdgeLen, cset)) {
00259         recast_destroyCompactHeightfield(chf);
00260         recast_destroyContourSet(cset);
00261 
00262         return 0;
00263     }
00264 
00265     /* ** Step 6: Build polygons mesh from contours ** */
00266     *pmesh = recast_newPolyMesh();
00267     if (!recast_buildPolyMesh(cset, recastParams->vertsperpoly, *pmesh)) {
00268         recast_destroyCompactHeightfield(chf);
00269         recast_destroyContourSet(cset);
00270         recast_destroyPolyMesh(*pmesh);
00271 
00272         return 0;
00273     }
00274 
00275 
00276     /* ** Step 7: Create detail mesh which allows to access approximate height on each polygon ** */
00277 
00278     *dmesh = recast_newPolyMeshDetail();
00279     if (!recast_buildPolyMeshDetail(*pmesh, chf, detailSampleDist, detailSampleMaxError, *dmesh)) {
00280         recast_destroyCompactHeightfield(chf);
00281         recast_destroyContourSet(cset);
00282         recast_destroyPolyMesh(*pmesh);
00283         recast_destroyPolyMeshDetail(*dmesh);
00284 
00285         return 0;
00286     }
00287 
00288     recast_destroyCompactHeightfield(chf);
00289     recast_destroyContourSet(cset);
00290 
00291     return 1;
00292 }
00293 
00294 static Object *createRepresentation(bContext *C, struct recast_polyMesh *pmesh, struct recast_polyMeshDetail *dmesh, Base *base)
00295 {
00296     float co[3], rot[3];
00297     BMEditMesh *em;
00298     int i, j, k;
00299     unsigned short *v;
00300     int face[3];
00301     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00302     Object *obedit;
00303     int createob = base == NULL;
00304     int nverts, nmeshes, nvp;
00305     unsigned short *verts, *polys;
00306     unsigned int *meshes;
00307     float bmin[3], cs, ch, *dverts;
00308     unsigned char *tris;
00309 
00310     zero_v3(co);
00311     zero_v3(rot);
00312 
00313     if (createob) {
00314         /* create new object */
00315         obedit = ED_object_add_type(C, OB_MESH, co, rot, FALSE, 1);
00316     }
00317     else {
00318         obedit = base->object;
00319         scene_select_base(scene, base);
00320         copy_v3_v3(obedit->loc, co);
00321         copy_v3_v3(obedit->rot, rot);
00322     }
00323 
00324     ED_object_enter_editmode(C, EM_DO_UNDO | EM_IGNORE_LAYER);
00325     em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00326 
00327     if (!createob) {
00328         /* clear */
00329         EDBM_mesh_clear(em);
00330     }
00331 
00332     /* create verts for polygon mesh */
00333     verts = recast_polyMeshGetVerts(pmesh, &nverts);
00334     recast_polyMeshGetBoundbox(pmesh, bmin, NULL);
00335     recast_polyMeshGetCell(pmesh, &cs, &ch);
00336 
00337     for (i = 0; i < nverts; i++) {
00338         v = &verts[3 * i];
00339         co[0] = bmin[0] + v[0] * cs;
00340         co[1] = bmin[1] + v[1] * ch;
00341         co[2] = bmin[2] + v[2] * cs;
00342         SWAP(float, co[1], co[2]);
00343         BM_vert_create(em->bm, co, NULL);
00344     }
00345 
00346     /* create custom data layer to save polygon idx */
00347     CustomData_add_layer_named(&em->bm->pdata, CD_RECAST, CD_CALLOC, NULL, 0, "createRepresentation recastData");
00348     CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(&em->bm->pdata, 0, BM_FACE);
00349     
00350     /* create verts and faces for detailed mesh */
00351     meshes = recast_polyMeshDetailGetMeshes(dmesh, &nmeshes);
00352     polys = recast_polyMeshGetPolys(pmesh, NULL, &nvp);
00353     dverts = recast_polyMeshDetailGetVerts(dmesh, NULL);
00354     tris = recast_polyMeshDetailGetTris(dmesh, NULL);
00355 
00356     for (i = 0; i < nmeshes; i++) {
00357         int uniquevbase = em->bm->totvert;
00358         unsigned int vbase = meshes[4 * i + 0];
00359         unsigned short ndv = meshes[4 * i + 1];
00360         unsigned short tribase = meshes[4 * i + 2];
00361         unsigned short trinum = meshes[4 * i + 3];
00362         const unsigned short *p = &polys[i * nvp * 2];
00363         int nv = 0;
00364 
00365         for (j = 0; j < nvp; ++j) {
00366             if (p[j] == 0xffff) break;
00367             nv++;
00368         }
00369 
00370         /* create unique verts  */
00371         for (j = nv; j < ndv; j++) {
00372             copy_v3_v3(co, &dverts[3 * (vbase + j)]);
00373             SWAP(float, co[1], co[2]);
00374             BM_vert_create(em->bm, co, NULL);
00375         }
00376 
00377         EDBM_index_arrays_init(em, 1, 0, 0);
00378 
00379         /* create faces */
00380         for (j = 0; j < trinum; j++) {
00381             unsigned char *tri = &tris[4 * (tribase + j)];
00382             BMFace *newFace;
00383             int *polygonIdx;
00384 
00385             for (k = 0; k < 3; k++) {
00386                 if (tri[k] < nv)
00387                     face[k] = p[tri[k]];  /* shared vertex */
00388                 else
00389                     face[k] = uniquevbase + tri[k] - nv;  /* unique vertex */
00390             }
00391             newFace = BM_face_create_quad_tri(em->bm,
00392                                               EDBM_vert_at_index(em, face[0]),
00393                                               EDBM_vert_at_index(em, face[2]),
00394                                               EDBM_vert_at_index(em, face[1]), NULL,
00395                                               NULL, FALSE);
00396 
00397             /* set navigation polygon idx to the custom layer */
00398             polygonIdx = (int *)CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, newFace->head.data, CD_RECAST);
00399             *polygonIdx = i + 1; /* add 1 to avoid zero idx */
00400         }
00401         
00402         EDBM_index_arrays_free(em);
00403     }
00404 
00405     recast_destroyPolyMesh(pmesh);
00406     recast_destroyPolyMeshDetail(dmesh);
00407 
00408     DAG_id_tag_update((ID *)obedit->data, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00409     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, obedit->data);
00410 
00411 
00412     ED_object_exit_editmode(C, EM_FREEDATA); 
00413     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT | ND_DRAW, obedit);
00414 
00415     if (createob) {
00416         obedit->gameflag &= ~OB_COLLISION;
00417         obedit->gameflag |= OB_NAVMESH;
00418         obedit->body_type = OB_BODY_TYPE_NAVMESH;
00419         rename_id((ID *)obedit, "Navmesh");
00420     }
00421 
00422     BKE_mesh_ensure_navmesh(obedit->data);
00423 
00424     return obedit;
00425 }
00426 
00427 static int navmesh_create_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00428 {
00429     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00430     LinkNode *obs = NULL;
00431     Base *navmeshBase = NULL;
00432 
00433     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base*, base, selected_editable_bases) {
00434         if (base->object->type == OB_MESH) {
00435             if (base->object->body_type == OB_BODY_TYPE_NAVMESH) {
00436                 if (!navmeshBase || base == scene->basact) {
00437                     navmeshBase = base;
00438                 }
00439             }
00440             else {
00441                 BLI_linklist_append(&obs, (void *)base->object);
00442             }
00443         }
00444     }
00445     CTX_DATA_END;
00446 
00447     if (obs) {
00448         struct recast_polyMesh *pmesh = NULL;
00449         struct recast_polyMeshDetail *dmesh = NULL;
00450 
00451         int nverts = 0, ntris = 0;
00452         int *tris = 0;
00453         float *verts = NULL;
00454 
00455         createVertsTrisData(C, obs, &nverts, &verts, &ntris, &tris);
00456         BLI_linklist_free(obs, NULL);
00457         buildNavMesh(&scene->gm.recastData, nverts, verts, ntris, tris, &pmesh, &dmesh);
00458         createRepresentation(C, pmesh, dmesh, navmeshBase);
00459 
00460         MEM_freeN(verts);
00461         MEM_freeN(tris);
00462 
00463         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00464     }
00465     else {
00466         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "No mesh objects found");
00467 
00468         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00469     }
00470 }
00471 
00472 void MESH_OT_navmesh_make(wmOperatorType *ot)
00473 {
00474     /* identifiers */
00475     ot->name = "Create navigation mesh";
00476     ot->description = "Create navigation mesh for selected objects";
00477     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_navmesh_make";
00478 
00479     /* api callbacks */
00480     ot->exec = navmesh_create_exec;
00481 
00482     /* flags */
00483     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00484 }
00485 
00486 static int navmesh_face_copy_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00487 {
00488     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00489     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00490 
00491     /* do work here */
00492     BMFace *efa_act = BM_active_face_get(em->bm, FALSE);
00493 
00494     if (efa_act) {
00495         if (CustomData_has_layer(&em->bm->pdata, CD_RECAST)) {
00496             BMFace *efa;
00497             BMIter iter;
00498             int targetPolyIdx = *(int *)CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa_act->head.data, CD_RECAST);
00499             targetPolyIdx = targetPolyIdx >= 0 ? targetPolyIdx : -targetPolyIdx;
00500 
00501             if (targetPolyIdx > 0) {
00502                 /* set target poly idx to other selected faces */
00503                 BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00504                     if (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT) && efa != efa_act) {
00505                         int *recastDataBlock = (int *)CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_RECAST);
00506                         *recastDataBlock = targetPolyIdx;
00507                     }
00508                 }
00509             }
00510             else {
00511                 BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Active face has no index set");
00512             }
00513         }
00514     }
00515 
00516     DAG_id_tag_update((ID *)obedit->data, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00517     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, obedit->data);
00518 
00519     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00520 }

00522 void MESH_OT_navmesh_face_copy(struct wmOperatorType *ot)
00523 {
00524     /* identifiers */
00525     ot->name = "NavMesh Copy Face Index";
00526     ot->description = "Copy the index from the active face";
00527     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_navmesh_face_copy";
00528 
00529     /* api callbacks */
00530     ot->poll = ED_operator_editmesh;
00531     ot->exec = navmesh_face_copy_exec;
00532 
00533     /* flags */
00534     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00535 }
00536 
00537 static int compare(const void *a, const void *b)
00538 {
00539     return (*(int *)a - *(int *)b);
00540 }
00541 
00542 static int findFreeNavPolyIndex(BMEditMesh *em)
00543 {
00544     /* construct vector of indices */
00545     int numfaces = em->bm->totface;
00546     int *indices = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int) * numfaces, "findFreeNavPolyIndex(indices)");
00547     BMFace *ef;
00548     BMIter iter;
00549     int i, idx = em->bm->totface - 1, freeIdx = 1;
00550 
00551     /*XXX this originally went last to first, but that isn't possible anymore*/
00552     BM_ITER_MESH (ef, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00553         int polyIdx = *(int *)CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, ef->head.data, CD_RECAST);
00554         indices[idx] = polyIdx;
00555         idx--;
00556     }
00557 
00558     qsort(indices, numfaces, sizeof(int), compare);
00559 
00560     /* search first free index */
00561     freeIdx = 1;
00562     for (i = 0; i < numfaces; i++) {
00563         if (indices[i] == freeIdx)
00564             freeIdx++;
00565         else if (indices[i] > freeIdx)
00566             break;
00567     }
00568 
00569     MEM_freeN(indices);
00570 
00571     return freeIdx;
00572 }
00573 
00574 static int navmesh_face_add_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00575 {
00576     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00577     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00578     BMFace *ef;
00579     BMIter iter;
00580     
00581     if (CustomData_has_layer(&em->bm->pdata, CD_RECAST)) {
00582         int targetPolyIdx = findFreeNavPolyIndex(em);
00583 
00584         if (targetPolyIdx > 0) {
00585             /* set target poly idx to selected faces */
00586             /*XXX this originally went last to first, but that isn't possible anymore*/
00587             
00588             BM_ITER_MESH (ef, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00589                 if (BM_elem_flag_test(ef, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00590                     int *recastDataBlock = (int *)CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, ef->head.data, CD_RECAST);
00591                     *recastDataBlock = targetPolyIdx;
00592                 }
00593             }
00594         }
00595     }
00596 
00597     DAG_id_tag_update((ID *)obedit->data, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00598     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, obedit->data);
00599 
00600     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00601 }
00602 
00603 void MESH_OT_navmesh_face_add(struct wmOperatorType *ot)
00604 {
00605     /* identifiers */
00606     ot->name = "NavMesh New Face Index";
00607     ot->description = "Add a new index and assign it to selected faces";
00608     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_navmesh_face_add";
00609 
00610     /* api callbacks */
00611     ot->poll = ED_operator_editmesh;
00612     ot->exec = navmesh_face_add_exec;
00613 
00614     /* flags */
00615     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00616 }
00617 
00618 static int navmesh_obmode_data_poll(bContext *C)
00619 {
00620     Object *ob = ED_object_active_context(C);
00621     if (ob && (ob->mode == OB_MODE_OBJECT) && (ob->type == OB_MESH)) {
00622         Mesh *me = ob->data;
00623         return CustomData_has_layer(&me->pdata, CD_RECAST);
00624     }
00625     return FALSE;
00626 }
00627 
00628 static int navmesh_obmode_poll(bContext *C)
00629 {
00630     Object *ob = ED_object_active_context(C);
00631     if (ob && (ob->mode == OB_MODE_OBJECT) && (ob->type == OB_MESH)) {
00632         return TRUE;
00633     }
00634     return FALSE;
00635 }
00636 
00637 static int navmesh_reset_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00638 {
00639     Object *ob = ED_object_active_context(C);
00640     Mesh *me = ob->data;
00641 
00642     CustomData_free_layers(&me->pdata, CD_RECAST, me->totpoly);
00643 
00644     BKE_mesh_ensure_navmesh(me);
00645 
00646     DAG_id_tag_update(&me->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00647     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, &me->id);
00648 
00649     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00650 }

00656     ot->description = "Assign a new index to every face";
00657     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_navmesh_reset";

00661     ot->exec = navmesh_reset_exec;
00662 
00663     /* flags */
00664     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00665 }

00667 static int navmesh_clear_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00668 {
00669     Object *ob = ED_object_active_context(C);
00670     Mesh *me = ob->data;
00671 
00672     CustomData_free_layers(&me->pdata, CD_RECAST, me->totpoly);
00673 
00674     DAG_id_tag_update(&me->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00675     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, &me->id);
00676 
00677     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00678 }

00680 void MESH_OT_navmesh_clear(struct wmOperatorType *ot)
00681 {
00682     /* identifiers */
00683     ot->name = "NavMesh Clear Data";
00684     ot->description = "Remove navmesh data from this mesh";
00685     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_navmesh_clear";
00686

00690 
00691     /* flags */
